metadata.title: CVE-2023-28466 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
do_tls_getsockopt in net/tls/tls_main.c in the Linux kernel through 6.2.6lacks a lock_sock call, leading to a race condition (with a resultantuse-after-free or NULL pointer dereference).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-79-generic - 5.15.0-79.86
linux-image-5.15.0-79-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-79.86
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-79-generic - 5.15.0-79.86
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-79-generic-64k - 5.15.0-79.86
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-79.86').
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2, was needed').
